description:
Oh no, a smiley has escaped its comment cage!
Put it back, and fix the output.
McDonalds needs you to finish their drive thru bot, hop to it you clown.
output:
Hello, Bob
Enjoy your #7 Big Mac

description: We're trying to 3D print our Christmas Tree, but something got lost in the download. See if you can fix it ...
McDonalds has promoted you to head of their business department, so start crunching those numbers.
Uh oh, the new shipment of freezers can only be set in Celsius. We need a conversion program ASAP or all the nugs will go bad!
output:
I want the freezer set to 18.0F
Freezer set to -7.777777777777778C

description:
Well, the guys back at headquarters managed to lose an entire car and plane this time.
Guess you're the new engineer now, better get rolling.
output:
I am an abstract concept incapable of movement. I would deliver nothing if I was real
Vroom, vroom! *slaps roof of car* This bad boy can fit so many nothing
Whoosh! I can carry 42,000 pounds of nothing

I am an abstract concept incapable of movement. I would deliver nugs if I was real
Vroom, vroom! *slaps roof of car* This bad boy can fit so many burgers
Whoosh! I can carry 42,000 pounds of fries
